SEARCH

Package color

package color
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the color picker, color schemes, and colors.

This package also contains an input helper class that is used to get input from the user.

Note: This program is written in JDK 21 and may require JDK 21 or higher.

Since:
21.0.4
Author:
Euan Jed S. Tabamo
Date Created:
04 October 2024, 17:48
  • Class
    Description
    Color
    The Color interface is responsible for a list of colors from a 12-color color wheel and method signatures for showing the colors of a color scheme with one, two, three, or four colors.
    ColorScheme
    The ColorScheme class is responsible for showing the colors of a color scheme with one, two, three, or four colors based on a color scheme.
    InputHelper
    The InputHelper class is responsible for handling user input.
    Picker
    The Picker class is responsible for showing the main menu of schemes and colors menu.
